title: pixel 3a stuck into fastboor mode and couldn't get out of this situation
content:
pixel 3a trapped into fastboot mode, and have no idea to get out of this situation. tried long pressing power button, but it just gets to this fastboot mode back again. with volume up and power button it came once to the colorful screen"google", but don't know why and what have I done, and right now, still trying to fix it with some combo keys. But I think professional help is extremely urgend.
Btw, I also have the problem with volume down button, it doesn't work and my voice will turn off automatically, creepy ?

device state: locked
boot slot:b
